name: Johnny Rioux CowbOi! Full length CD
description:
Here it is in the US, the Randale released full length CD release of my CowbOi! record. Featuring my friend Jeff Morris of The Bruisers on lead guitar, Pete Sosa, my Street Dogs bandmate on drums, and I take on Vocal, rhythm guitar, and upright bass. I cover some of my biggest Oi!/ Street Punk/ hardcore influences in a country/ rockabilly style. I've always viewed the 2 as similar in being working class music for working class people. I hope you enjoy listening to it as much as I enjoyed making and recording it. Thanks for the support!
Johnny
